text: anybody got this error ? any kind of help will be appreciated. Thanks!
Sharing some your code might be a better approach to getting a fix for this error. It does seem rather odd.
Nothing in code yet, I just created a function in my client's portal and tried to hit that URL but got the above error.
I have tested the same procedure on another HubSpot portal and it worked perfectly fine.
serverless functions are enterprise only that might be the case here
yes, I have enterprise that account, that's why it is allowing me to create a function :slightly_smiling_face:
i wonder if the hs staging url is the issue. Is your other implementation using the domain or a similar staging url?

I tested on both
1. with connected domain 
2. without connected domain 
:disappointed:
in other portals work on both but in this portal it is not working on both
